dcterms:description: The SoundingEarth dataset contains over 50k geotagged audio recordings from 136 countries, paired with their corresponding overhead images, aimed at learning a good audio-visual embedding space useful for various downstream tasks in remote sensing.
dcterms:title: SoundingEarth

dcterms:description: The ESC50 dataset is a collection of 2000 environmental audio recordings organized into 50 classes, each containing 40 recordings, used for environmental sound classification tasks.
dcterms:title: ESC50

dcterms:description: Radio Aporee is an online platform dedicated to creating a global soundmap, hosting diverse audio recordings from urban, rural, and natural environments, published under the creative commons license.
dcterms:title: Radio Aporee
